title: Smart Data models - Fleet-Vehicle schema
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic fleet vehicle such as a delivery vehicle, an ambulance or a postal vehicle. This entity is primarily associated with the vertical segment of the transport and logistics but may also be used many other related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity identifier. It has to be FleetVehicle

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

vehicle.description: Relationship. Reference to the related Vehicle entity instance that describes the core attributes of this Fleet Vehicle.

fleetVehicleType.description: Property. The type of the Vehicle for example (not limited to) these ones. Enum:'Taxi, Ambulance, Postal, Fire & Rescue, Delivery'

operatingCompany.description: Property. Details of the organization that is operating this fleet vehicle. Based on Schema.org organization. Model:'https://schema.org/Organization'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

operator.description: Relationship. The usual operator/driver/keeper of this fleet vehicle encoded as a Schema.org person. Model:'https://schema.org/Person'
